description: This template deploys SharePoint 2019, 2016 and 2013. Each SharePoint version is independent and may or may not be deployed, depending on your needs. A DC is provisioned and configured with ADFS and ADCS, and a unique SQL Server is provisioned for all SharePoint farms. Farms are optimized for running integration tests: minimum configuration to provision quickly, but still viable to cover most scenarios.
summary: This template deploys SharePoint 2019, 2016 and 2013. Each SharePoint version is independent and may or may not be deployed, depending on your needs.
